Formats and Editions

More Info:

Black Sunday is the powerful story of a Black September terrorist group attempting to blow up a Goodyear blimp hovering over the Super Bowl stadium with 80,000 people and the president of the United States in attendance.Starring Robert Shaw, Bruce Dern, and Marthe Keller.Special Features and Technical Specs:1080p presentation of the film on Blu-rayAudio Commentary by film historian Stephen Prince (2020)"FOURTH DOWN: COMPOSING BLACK SUNDAY" - An interview with film music historian Daniel Schweiger about the John Williams score. (2020)DTS HD 5.1 surroundLPCM 2.0 StereoOptional English subtitlesTheatrical Trailer
